mapper.select: SELECT ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, POSITION, REGDATE, COMPANY_IDX, JOINDATE, GRADE, FILE_NAME, ORI_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, POSITION, REGDATE, COMPANY_IDX, JOINDATE, GRADE, FILE_NAME, ORI_NAME) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{position}, SYSDATE, null, null, 0, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PW = #{pw}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, POSITION = #{position}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName}, ORI_NAME = #{oriName} WHERE ID = #{id}
